io.jsonwebtoken.impl.compression

Class AbstractCompressionCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jsonwebtoken.impl.compression.AbstractCompressionCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompressionCodec
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeflateCompressionCodec, GzipCompressionCodec

    public abstract class AbstractCompressionCodec
extends Object
implements CompressionCodec
    Abstract class that asserts arguments and wraps IOException with CompressionException.
    Since:
    0.6.0
